definition: quiet and easy to control
tending to allow somebody to have or do whatever they want
willing or too willing to ignore the weaknesses in somebody/something

the development of a complicated or detailed plan, idea, etc.

not further than a particular distance from something

inside something/somebody

a person who is thought to continue the work or a tradition started by somebody else
to receive money, property, etc. from somebody when they die
to have qualities, physical features, etc. that are similar to those of your parents, grandparents, etc.
if you inherit a particular situation from somebody, you are now responsible for dealing with it, especially because you have replaced that person in their job
to take back property or goods from somebody who has arranged to buy them but who still owes money for them and cannot pay
the area inside the entrance of a hotel, an office building, etc. where guests or visitors go first when they arrive
a formal social occasion to welcome somebody or celebrate something
the type of welcome that is given to somebody/something

an act of catching the ball when it is thrown forward
to admit that you have been defeated and want to stop fighting; to allow yourself to be caught, taken prisoner, etc.
to give up something/somebody when you are forced to
to form an organization or a group again in a different way
to bring dried food, etc. back to its original form by adding water
having a round shape
a strong wish to have or do something

a person or thing that is wished for

to look at somebody/something, especially in a particular way
relating to or in connection with somebody/something

the state of being important, well known or easy to notice
